_comment: the homepath to your Loridane should be set here, this can not be empty, close the directories with a / please
set here if the payloads of the lora nodes should be encrypted or not, key and initalisation vector must be a 16byte hex-tring and the same in your nodes
The initial frequency the gateway should be listening to, this overrides the gateway setting
If The Gateway is attached to USB at the server the ui configuration can be automated
